File:The Fat Lady Sings.ogg7 June 2018Theatre of Blood572

The Fat Lady Sings is a music track that is unlocked during the fight with Lady Verzik Vitur in the Theatre of Blood. The vocals for Lady Verzik were done by Kate Smith.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • This track and It's not over 'til... are a reference to the phrase "It ain't over till the fat lady sings".

'''The Fat Lady Sings''' is a [[music]] track that is unlocked during the fight with [[Verzik Vitur|Lady Verzik Vitur]] in the [[Theatre of Blood]]. The vocals for Lady Verzik were done by Kate Smith.

==Trivia==
*This track and [[It's not over 'til...]] are a reference to the phrase "{{WP|It ain't over till the fat lady sings}}".
